lead_paragraph: Steve Spurrier, South Carolina's coach, said that he would be in Gainesville, Fla., on Sept. 2 when Florida honors its 1996 national championship team, which he coached.
snippet: Steve Spurrier, South Carolina's coach, said that he would be in Gainesville, Fla., on Sept. 2 when Florida honors its 1996 national championship team, which he coached.
